code: import React from'react';import'./Toggle.css';import PinkMoon from'../../img/moon (4).png';import PinkSun from'../../img/sunrise.png';import{themeContext}from'../../context';import{useContext}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Toggle(){var theme=useContext(themeContext);var darkMode=theme.state.darkMode;var handleClick=function handleClick(){theme.dispatch({type:'toggle'});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"toggle",onClick:handleClick,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:PinkMoon,alt:"",style:darkMode?{opacity:'0.0'}:{opacity:'1'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:PinkSun,alt:"",style:darkMode?{opacity:'1',marginLeft:'-15px'}:{opacity:'0.0'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"toggle-button",style:darkMode?{left:'2px'}:{right:'2px'}})]});}export default Toggle;
